Posts.Title: Having a bit of a wobble.......

Posts.Content: Hi Joan.Yes,thats not a good word to use.I had my 1st mammogram recently and I have to go back because the films didnt turn out too well.I will let you know if they use the same word or not.Take care xx
Posts.Title: "Satisfactory" - whatever that means!

Posts.Content: Hi.Im very sorry you are going through this.I dont know much about sentinel nodes but from what Ive just looked up I wouldnt just let him do the clearance.I would insist he do a biopsy first or get a second opinion.You should have some decision in this,its your body.Good luck.HUGS xxxx
Posts.Title: Double Mastectomy, Axillary node clearance and Sentinel node clea...

Posts.Content: Can you talk to your GP? Just tell your gp how you feel and ask if he/she has any advice.sorry Im not a lot of help.You could try posting a blog and you may get more replies.Take care.HUGS xx
Posts.Title: SO FRIGHTENED, HAVING A BIT OF A MOMENT

Posts.Content: Hi CJ.Have you got one of those nice hats you can get (from where i dont exactly know myself but others will know).? HUGS xxxx
Posts.Title: THIRD CHEMO TODAY

Posts.Content: If shes not got a happy homelife then its probably jealousy of the support you have.I think (and only my opinion) that she has depression and as depression has stigma (unfortunately) attached to it then she probably doesnt want to say.I do understand how she feels because she probably feels guilty too for feeling like that although she shouldnt.Cancer is awful but depression is too.I hope you dont mind me comparing them.See if you can have a private chat with her.Maybe tell her you are worried about her and that you dont mind whatever she says.I hope you dont think Im awful in what Ive said and i wish you well xxxx
Posts.Title: sister is so guilty about cancer
